entity.name: Document
entity.description: A Document is a type of Product and is a logical document that serves as the identifier for a container for some product data.

description.p: A Document_version is a type of product version applicable to a document. A Document_version identifies a Document after it has undergone a formal release or change. Only changes that are formally tracked shall result in a new instance of a Document_version.
The product to which the document version is associated shall be classified, categorized or typed as a document.

where.label: WR1
where.description: The Document_version shall be a variant of a 'document'.
